description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 3.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Water Heaters that are effective April 16, 2015. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=water_heat.pr_crit_water_heaters

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Water Heaters
